definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: So it may have resembled a centipede or millipede , or a worm with legs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，它也許類似蜈蚣或多足動物，或者有腳的蠕蟲。

sentences.english: Let's count. How many legs does it have?
sentences.chinese: 呈現一個多足動物，讓學生數一數。

sentences.english: Myriapod animals were probably one of the invertebrate animal groups that first colonized the terrestrial ecosystem during Early Paleozoic.
sentences.chinese: 多足動物可能是最早入侵陸地環境的無脊椎動物之一。
